sourcesContent:
import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { removeFromCart, decreaseCart } from "../features/cartSlice"; const Cart = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleRemoveFromCart = (cartItem) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(cartItem)); }; const handleDecreaseCart = (cartItem) => { dispatch(decreaseCart(cartItem)); }; return (

My cart

{/* Check if cart is empty, by accessing state */} {cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is currently empty.

Start shopping now
) : (

Product

Price

Quantity

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map((cartItem) => (

{cartItem.name}

{cartItem.desc}

${cartItem.price}
{cartItem.cartQuantity}
${cartItem.price * cartItem.cartQuantity}
))}
Subtotal ${cart.cartTotalAmount}

Taxes and shipping calculated at checkout

Continue shopping
)}
); }; export default Cart;
